name: Pretty in pinks £10 each
description:
buTTon CAndy designs are developed using a mix of vintage & modern day buttons & buckles to create brooches,rings,ear rings, clip-on ear rings, hair clips & cuff links.

Each piece of buTTon CAndy is hand made and unique, so if you have a colour combination in mind, please feel free to get in touch via email.

To see buTTon CAndy's full range of product pop down to Whitecross St Market in Barbican every Thursday and Friday 11am to 3pm.

buTTon CAndy will be showing at BBC Manchester on 17th November and 7th December 2010.

Runnymede Centre- Surrey 23rd November 2010.

Cass Business College-Barbican 1st December 2010

Craft Guerilla Christmas market 2010 William Morris Gallery Walthamstow -  Sunday 11am to 4pm on 5th December 2010 

buTTon CAndy can also be purchased from a number of boutiques including:

Smug -Angel www.ifeelsmug.com
Sublime-Victoria Park/Clerkenwell
My Sugarland - Angel
Clifton Interiors -Primrose Hill
L'Orangerie-Columbia Rd
Red Door Gallery-Greenwich
Mosaic-Whitstable
Butterflies and Dreams-Northumberland
Mendoza-Brick Lane

Showing are beautiful pink cluster brooches for that girlie girl, or boy :)
